price: كه موږ وغواړو هغه به تروې ترخې كړو نو ولې شكر نه باسئ؟
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
